game.name: Cube Kingdoms
game.shortDescription: You are the liege of a small village in a medieval fantasy setting. Build your own kingdom by developing an economy, trading, defending yourself, and either eliminating your enemies or forging alliances with them.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are the liege of a small village in a medieval fantasy setting. Build your own kingdom by developing an economy, trading, defending yourself, and either eliminating your enemies or forging alliances with them.
